plurals.name: show_dev_countdown_cm
plurals.item: You are now %1$d step away from enabling development settings.
You are now %1$d steps away from enabling development settings.

resources.string: No need, you have already enabled development settings.
Enable app management shortcuts in recent apps list
Allowing apps to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
To configure and use system profiles, turn profiles on.
Writing a profile to a NFC tag allows for tapping the tag to select the profile. Tapping a second time will select the previously selected profile.
This NFC tag refers to an unknown profile. Attaching this NFC tag to an existing profile will allow for selecting the profile in the future.
Configure profile using current device settings?
Add or remove notification override app groups to this profile
Delete all user created profiles and app groups and restore them to default?
Enter a name for the new app group
This profile option is disabled by a device administrator policy
Don\'t ask for PIN or password
Specify the region code for Wi\u2011Fi
There was a problem setting the region code.
Triggers which will activate this profile
Enter a name for the new app group
No Bluetooth devices paired.\nTap to pair Bluetooth device before configuring triggers.
No Wi\u2011Fi access points configured.\nTap to connect Wi\u2011Fi before configuring triggers.
No triggers configured. Tap to add more.
Tap to setup a new NFC trigger.
Please select triggers which will activate this profile
Now configure what happens when the profile is activated
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode

To get started tap the edit icon to unlock the navigation bar for editing.

You can tap an icon to change its shortcut, or long press an icon to re-arrange the layout.

Tap 'Save' to commit your changes, or 'Restore defaults' to reset the layout to default settings.
Delete current settings and restore the default layout?
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
Enable the Android Debug Bridge (adb) interface
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi\u2011Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Display a notification when USB or network debugging is enabled
Are you sure you wish to reset counters?
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
When the screen is off, long pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the power button will end the current call
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Pressing the home button will answer the current incoming call
Dynamically adjust the brightness of the display\'s backlight to maximize battery life while maintaining usability
Enhance display brightness and readability under bright sunlight
Dynamically enhance the color of the display
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Double-tap on the screen to turn on the display
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Values higher than %1$d%% are not recommended
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Optimize your screen based on time of day and ambient conditions to improve readability and reduce eyestrain
Increase brightness and saturation automatically under bright sunlight
Adjust display for lowest power consumption without degradation
Improve color vibrance of flesh tones, scenery, and other images
Deep red for preserving night vision

NOTICE: When this feature is enabled, your installed recovery will be replaced by one included with the current version of the running OS.

Your recovery will be updated along with upgrades to your system, helping to ensure compatibility with future versions.

Would you like to enable this feature?

WARNING: When this feature is disabled, your installed recovery will not be updated with OS upgrades.

Future OS updates may not install with outdated or custom recovery versions.

Do you really want to disable this feature?
Adjust hue, saturation, intensity, and contrast
Don\'t show heads up in these applications
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Post all notification from these applications to heads up
Already added this application to the list
Increase touchscreen sensitivity so it can be used while wearing gloves
Show the pointer icon when hovering or drawing with the stylus
Use swipe gestures by holding down the stylus button
Allows you to hover the screen like a mouse in web browsers, remote desktops, etc
Play a sound when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display the number of pending notifications
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Control which status bar icons are shown
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
Enable by default for newly-installed apps
Manage which apps have access to your personal data

In this screen you can choose which apps Privacy Guard should be active for by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs. Long pressing an app\'s entry opens its app details screen.\n\nBuilt-in apps are not shown by default but can be revealed by selecting the respective menu option.
Tap to enable the lock screen
Reduce performance and limit background data
Automatically choose an appropriate battery mode for various apps
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery, bootloader or performing a soft reboot
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set \'Enabled for all\' to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back button
Show the weather in the status bar header
Show search bar in recents menu
recent recents disable enable show hide search bar searchbar
Voice Wakeup needs to have phone call permissions to select a Direct Dial contact.
You don\'t have any blocked numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To prevent phone numbers from calling or messaging you, enable the blocked caller list.
You will not receive incoming calls or messages from phone numbers on the blocked caller list
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Unable to add invalid phone number to blocked caller list
Do you want to remove this blocked phone number?
Apps can send %d messages in 1 minute before requiring confirmation
Apps are not allowed to send any messages without confirmation
Enter primary email account and associated password to reset pattern lock
Manage which apps are hidden behind a secure lock
Must draw pattern or use fingerprint to unlock
Some apps may not function at non-standard DPI.\n\nThis will restart your device.
This APN already exists. Discard or change parameters.
SIM card will be deactivated. Do you want to continue?
This SIM will be disabled and SIM %1$s will be used for data services. Are you sure you want to continue?
Unable to perform the operation while airplane mode is on.
Unable to perform the operation while in call.

\n\nWARNING: This app does not declare the ability for it to be moved to adopted storage. You may forcibly move it regardless but app data may need to be cleared in order for it to function correctly.
Moving ^1 and its data to ^2 will take only a few moments. You won\u2019t be able to use the app until the move is complete. \n\nDon\u2019t remove the ^2 during the move.^3

This will erase all data from your tablet's internal storage, including:


Your device accounts

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps

This will erase all data from your phone's internal storage, including:


Your device accounts

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps
This will erase all your accounts, apps, app data, and system settings on this device
Erase music, photos, videos, and other user data stored on this device
Erase music, photos, videos, and other user data stored on this device. \n\nContent cannot be saved due to device encryption.
Erase all data on the SD card, including music and photos
All your accounts, apps, app data, and system settings will be removed from this device. This cannot be reversed.
Portable Wi\u2011Fi hotspot will never timeout
Portable Wi\u2011Fi hotspot will timeout after %1$s
Enable and configure Live lock screens
To view available Live lock screens, turn Live lock screens on.
Do not reduce media playback volume when a notification arrives
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Prevent app from using Wi\u2011Fi data connection
Prevent app from using cellular data connection
Unable to launch the settings menu of this provider
Notify when the app uses a significant amount of data
This will clear all past and present data tracking information
Disable data access on cellular networks

This feature may cause an app that depends on network access to stop working when only cellular networks are available.\n\nYou can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app.
Show notifications from this app on the lock screen
Disable persistent notification on lock screen
Never show persistent notifications from this app on the lock screen
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the %1$s of your phone.
